content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE: Lights Out*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on March 11, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Featherweight Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Featherweight_World_Championship) title bout between champion Thanh Le and title challenger [Garry Tonon](/wiki/Garry_Tonon) was scheduled as the main event. ONE Bantamweight World Champion [Bibiano Fernandes](/wiki/Bibiano_Fernandes) defends his belt against top-ranked contender [John Lineker](/wiki/John_Lineker), and newly crowned ONE Strawweight Muay Thai World Champion [Prajanchai PK.Saenchai](/wiki/Prajanchai_P.K.Saenchaimuaythaigym) makes his first title defense against #3-ranked [Joseph Lasiri](/wiki/Joseph_Lasiri). after Lasiri Withdraw because of injury during training, Prajanchai vs Lasiri to cancelled and moved to [ONE 157](/wiki/ONE_157) Kirill Gorobets will make his promotional debut against former two-division ONE world champion [Martin Nguyen](/wiki/Martin_Nguyen). ## Results Main Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFeatherweight[Thanh Le](/wiki/Thanh_Le) (c)def.[Garry Tonon](/wiki/Garry_Tonon)KO (punches)10:56[a]Bantamweight[John Lineker](/wiki/John_Lineker)def.[Bibiano Fernandes](/wiki/Bibiano_Fernandes) (c)KO (punch)23:40[b]Featherweight[Martin Nguyen](/wiki/Martin_Nguyen)def.Kirill GorobetsTKO (punches)32:18Catchweight (273 lbs) Kickboxing[Iraj Azizpour](/wiki/Iraj_Azizpour)def.[Ismael Londt](/wiki/Ismael_Londt)KO (punch)22:01[c]StrawweightAdrian Mattheisdef.[Alex Silva](/wiki/Alex_Silva_(fighter))TKO (punches)20:05Strawweight Kickboxing[Zhang Peimian](/wiki/Zhang_Peimian)def.Josh TonnaTKO (3 knockdown rules)22:11Lead Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Flyweight[Eko Roni Saputra](/wiki/Eko_Roni_Saputra)def.Chan RothanaSubmission (rear-naked choke)11:34Women's Strawweight Muay Thai[Iman Barlow](/wiki/Iman_Barlow)def.Daniela LópezTKO (doctor stoppage)11:39Catchweight (174 lbs) Muay Thai[Liam Nolan](/wiki/Liam_Nolan_(Muay_Thai))def.Kim Kyung-lockTKO (knees)11:02Women's Atomweight KickboxingLin Heqindef.Milagros LópezDecision (unanimous)33:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Thanh Le, John Lineker, Zhang Peimain, Iman Barlow** and **Liam Nolan** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) -
